channel.title: Help me please
channel.description: Hi when i'm on any private server i get a lot of disconnections they occur like every 5mins or most of the time when i kill a monster or person i am using a wireless router EchoLife HG520s and my fire wall is turned off on my computer and on my router what could be causing this problem and could someone please post a fix thanks.

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @o01pku o01pku
item.description:
@o01pku wrote:

it happens to all the servers i play

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please

item.description:

it’s not your computer, it’s just because the servers you’re playing are shitty
